EXECUTED.Definition: killed as a legal punishment or political act

INDULGENCES.Definition: acts of allowing oneself to enjoy pleasures

LAZINESS.Definition: the quality of not being willing to work

IRONICALLY.Definition: in a way that is interesting or strange because of being different from what someone would expect

PUN.Definition: play on words to show its different meaning or use

CLUE.Definition: information that helps to explain it

SATIRE.Definition: the use of humour or jokes to criticise something

FICTION.Definition: something that is invented and not true

CHAOTIC.Definition: in a state of confusion or no order

MONKS.Definition: members of male religious groups usually living in monasteries

NUNS.Definition: members of female religious groups usually living in convents

NUDITY.Definition: the state of wearing no clothes or being naked

HAWKS.Definition: large birds that hunt smaller animals

OPENED THE FLOODGATES.Definition: allowed it to happen a lot

RECKLESS.Definition: not concerned about danger and consequences

AIM.Definition: have as a goal, direct ourselves towards

ARCHITECTS.Definition: the people responsible for realising the idea

CELIBATE.Definition: not believing in either sex or marriage

SUSTAIN.Definition: cause them to stay the same for a long period of time

RECRUITMENT.Definition: the process of finding people to become new members

SWINGERS.Definition: people who openly have sex with multiple partners

MILL-OWNER.Definition: the owner of a building used for making flour from grain

MILLING.Definition: related to the activity of making flour from grain in a mill

UNITY.Definition: the state of being together and in agreement

WARN.Definition: inform in advance or beforehand for a possible problem

SUBURBS.Definition: areas on the edge of the city

THEORETICAL.Definition: based on ideas and not actions

TO STATE THE OBVIOUS.Definition: to say what everyone already knows

PROSPERITY.Definition: a state of being successful and wealthy

TURNS OUT.Definition: is shown or founded to be

END UP BEING.Definition: become eventually, turn out to be

EXCLUSIVE.Definition: limited to just a group of people

FIT INTO.Definition: be part of or in agreement with
